mapper.select: SELECT ranking, score, team_id, team_name, team_win, team_lose, team_draw, team_announcement, total_cnt, team_logo FROM ( SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY score DESC) AS ranking, score, team_id, team_name, team_win, team_lose, team_draw, team_announcement, total_cnt, team_logo FROM ( SELECT (team_win * 3 + team_draw + team_lose * (-3)) AS score, t.team_id, t.team_name, t.team_win, t.team_lose, t.team_draw, t.team_announcement, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE team_id = t.team_id) AS total_cnt, t.team_logo FROM team t INNER JOIN user u ON t.team_id = u.team_id GROUP BY t.team_id, t.team_name, t.team_win, t.team_lose, t.team_draw, t.team_announcement, t.team_logo ) subquery ) t WHERE t.team_id = #{team_id};
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET team_id = #{team_id}, user_team_join_date = now(), user_team_authority = "회원" WHERE id = #{id};
